EAP2851 - English for Academic Purposes.name: EAP2851 - English for Academic Purposes II

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Global Achievement Academy (GAA) and a grade of "C" (2.0) or higher in EAP 1850 or consent of Global Achievement Academy.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Development of advanced academic skills for international students. Topics include academic reading and vocabulary development; listening and note-taking; and writing practice and oral communication.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures
